text:
Learning a new CMS, platform, or framework is easier when you can relate it to things you already know.

CMS Hub for WordPress developers is a new video series, we partnered with <@U3T21PDBK> of Ascend Inbound Marketing to produce.
<https://youtu.be/B4m1jVe6PKE>

I’m not biased in saying this, I think John has done an amazing job on this video series. I think even experienced HubSpot developers will have some great take-aways.
I’ve been watching and think this is fantastic. Great job <@U3T21PDBK>!
